title: GALLERIE II Halloween Ichabod Crane Sleepy Hollow Folk Art Doll Collectible, Florence Lea Home Decor Figures Figurines White
features: DECORATE FOR THE SEASON: Bring the classic Halloween spooky thriller, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow, alive with this uniquely handcrafted art doll from Florence Lea. Create a matching set with love interest Katrina Van Tassel to create a legendary Halloween scene.

PERFECT SIZE: Figure measures 22 inches high and makes a statement on a table, counter, shelf, bookshelf or mantel. You can put this enchanting decoration in your living room, dining room, kitchen, bedroom, den or office.

HANDCRAFTED WITH QUALITY MATERIALS: Each collectible figure has a hand-painted face to provide realistic, intricate detail. Because of the handcrafted nature, each doll will have its own unique look. No two pieces look exactly alike!
COLLECTIBLE: Each creation from licensed artist Florence Lea begins with a single idea and is designed by hand to create the beautiful artisan dolls and figures you love.
GALLERIE II: Visit the store link at the top of the page to explore our collections.
description: Decorate for the season with this wonderful Ichabod Crane soft figure. Decorate for the spooky Halloween season with these festive figurines. Use them to decorate a table, mantel, or any other flat surface. They are perfect for your home or as a gift for a loved one. They are sure to delight year after year.
